subject: [Radiance-general] floating point in simulation
body:
I just read over an abstract of a thesis by Chris Thorne on

http://www.floatingorigin.com/

It has some interesting thoughts on problems of scaling and accuracy in
simulations. It may be interesting in Radiance world, so that is why I
post the link here. A lot is about animation-related issues, but there
are some more general topics of 3d models covered.

CU Lars.
